name: ⭕️ MLNDR Founders Collection: 001/Adora
description: ⭕️ Adora. A devoted mother that will do anything to keep her family safe and most importantly... Together.  Set in a dystopian future where natural resources are scarce and pollution is a global problem, the MLNDR Family Series will portray how I see our future as a species if our hunger for non-renewable natural resources continues to grow at the current pace.   The Founders collection will be comprised of 6 characters who will play as leading actors in my MLNDR Family series.   Holders of this token participate for a chance to win one of 10 NFTs from my props collection.
